name: database-table-dumper
title: Database Table Dumper
description: Export entire database tables to JSON or CSV format
content:
Overview

This application exports entire database tables from SQLite databases to either JSON or CSV format. Perfect for backing up tables, migrating data, or creating exports for analysis.

Features

  • Export entire tables to JSON or CSV
  • Automatic column detection
  • Support for SQLite databases
  • List available tables on error
  • Handle empty tables gracefully

Parameters

  • Database File: Upload your SQLite database file
  • Table Name: Enter the name of the table to export
  • Output Format: Choose between JSON or CSV format
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for the output file

Output

The application generates a file named {table_name}.json or {table_name}.csv containing all rows from the specified table.

Use Cases

  • Database table backups
  • Data migration between systems
  • Creating data exports for analysis
  • Archiving database contents
